name: Raticate
flavorText:
It uses its whis­
kers to maintain
its balance. It apparently
slows down if
they are cut off.

previous.name: Rattata
previous.flavorText:
Bites anything
when it attacks.
Small and very quick, it is a
common sight in
many places.

next.name: Spearow
next.flavorText:
It flaps its small wings busily to
fly. Using its beak, it searches
in grass for prey.
